attributes.action: Lower the vehicle taxes back to normal . From 01.04.2025 vehicle taxes raised .
attributes.additional_details: Tax increase %100 is not exceptable , we want the car taxes to be lowered before 01.04.2025
attributes.background:
As I personally witnessed that vehicle taxes increased effective from 01.04.2025 minimum %100 and electric vehicles use to be tax free now tax on them is 0 to up to £345 . 
We what this to be whipped out and bring back to what it was . It’s not fair .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions about the same matter: 

Protect VED Exemptions for qualifying Vehicles Beyond April 2025
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711153 

Lower VED caps: £10 for Zero Emission + £30 for Internal Combustion vehicles
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/718980
